text: Oscar Raul Paulin Delarrosahttp://www.abc.com.py/deportes/oscar- paulin-804297.html (born 31 July 1952 in Resistencia, Argentina)http://www.livefutbol.com/ficha_jugador/oscar- paulin/https://int.soccerway.com/coaches/oscar-paulin/180158/ is an Argentine–Paraguayan former association footballer and current coach who directs Sportivo Ameliano in the Paraguayan Tercera Division. ==Career== ===Player=== Paulín played for Argentine clubs Chaco For Ever and Aldosivi, as well as Paraguay's Club Olimpia Asunción, Guaraní, Sportivo Luqueño, Ecuador's LDU Portoviejo and Bolivia's Oriente Petrolero.http://www.abc.com.py/deportes/oscar- paulin-804297.htmlhttp://www.bdfa.com.ar/jugadores-OSCAR-RAUL- PAULIN-636.htmlhttp://www.livefutbol.com/ficha_jugador/oscar-paulin/ Paulin made four appearances for Olimpia Asunción during the 1977 Copa Libertadores.http://www.livefutbol.com/ficha_jugador/oscar-paulin/copa- libertadores-1977/club-olimpia/3/ ===Coach=== In 2003, directs Tacuary where he coaches players like Cristian Riveros.http://www.abc.com.py/730am/tacuary- hace-historia-al-golear-a-olimpia-690559.html Paulín coached Guaraní from 2003 to 2004.http://www.abc.com.py/deportes/oscar-paulin-804297.html During 2004, he coached the club in the Copa Libertadores and was replaced in February.http://www.emol.com/noticias/deportes/2004/02/09/137956/libertadores- ya-hay-un-dt-descabezado.html In 2011, coaches the first-team 3 de Febrero of Ciudad del Este,http://www.livefutbol.com/ficha_jugador/oscar- paulin/http://www.paraguay.com/futbol_paraguayo_deportes/oscar-paulin-el- elegido-para-sacar-del-pozo- al-3-74283?ep=truehttp://www.abc.com.py/deportes/oscar-paulin-este-punto-es- de-oro-308836.html and in 2014 manages the Youth Academy of the mentioned club.http://d10.paraguay.com/oscar-paulin-no-asumiria-el-3-etica- profesional-n42384 In 2015, takes Paraguayan Fourth Division club Sportivo Ameliano to Third Division for 2016 via promotion play- off.http://www.abc.com.py/edicion-impresa/deportes/ameliano-y-recoleta-a-la- final-y-ascendidos-a-la-b-1407591.html With two rounds remaining of the 2016, Paulín had placed Sportivo Ameliano at the top of the third division table and were ahead of the second placed team by one point. ==References== ==External links== * Soccerway Profile * BDFA Profile Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Club Olimpia footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Venezuela Category:Expatriate footballers in Paraguay Category:1952 births Category:Association football defenders
title: Oscar Paulin
